title: 淬炼插件不加载
author: z_yan
txt_content:
报错如下：
[19:32:17] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not load 'plugins\NewCustomCuiLian.jar' in folder 'plugins'
org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidPluginException: Cannot find main class `_new.custom.cuilian.NewCustomCuiLian'

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content:
org.bukkit.plugin.InvalidPluginException: Cannot find main class `_new.custom.cuilian.NewCustomCuiLian'复制代码
   找不到插件主类，这个是插件问题了；建议找另外的版本或者用winrar打开编辑一下里边的plugin.yml

replies.author: 隔壁老吕
replies.txt_content: 插件使用jdk1.8编译，请务必使用java8运行
